sentences.sContent: The road to the zoo turns off here.
sentences.sContent_eng: The road to the zoo turns off here.
sentences.sCn: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.sContent: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.sContent_eng: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.sCn: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.sContent: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.sCn: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了。

words.tran: 动物病；[动] 动物传染病

trans.tranOther: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them
